positions.title: Financial Analysis Senior Specialist
positions.description_html:
Additional responsibilities include and are not limited to -

1. Facilitating & reviewing YoY rate card models for practice finance
2. Revenue Forecasting & AOP Targets
3. Total TCV review via Pipeline data analysis
4. Managing year-end Budget Transfers
5. Acquistion-integration from a master data stand-point
6. CoP Analysis
7. FCIT Analysis
8. Other ad hoc tasks

positions.subtitle: NTT DATA Services
positions.description: Complete and singular ownership of the company's proprietory platform Envision. Responsbilities include but are not limited to -1. Processing Security requests, coordinating with CFOs, preparing quarterly reports2. Master Data Management for management reporting, including but not limited to creationand management of multiple departments, cost centers, profit centers, contextstructures for multiple accounts3. Project Costing owner - management of multiple rate cards and alignment to departments and country codes, mapping of project codes and account master id's4. Coordinating with various BU Finance teams for the purpose of finalizing the AnnualOperating Plan5. Leveraging SAP and SQL for data extraction and analysis6. Other ad hoc tasks
positions.title: Financial Analysis Specialist
positions.description_html:
Complete and singular ownership of the company's proprietory platform Envision. Responsbilities include but are not limited to -
1. Processing Security requests, coordinating with CFOs, preparing quarterly reports
2. Master Data Management for management reporting, including but not limited to creation
and management of multiple departments, cost centers, profit centers, context
structures for multiple accounts
3. Project Costing owner - management of multiple rate cards and alignment to departments and country codes, mapping of project codes and account master id's
4. Coordinating with various BU Finance teams for the purpose of finalizing the Annual
Operating Plan
5. Leveraging SAP and SQL for data extraction and analysis
6. Other ad hoc tasks
